name: v_vk_hdss_tnx
description: This table captures financial transactions processed in the system, including details such as transaction dates, amounts, and references.

columns.name: run_date
columns.description: The date when the transaction was processed in the system.

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each transaction.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date used for symbolic or simulated processing of transactions.

columns.name: so_ref
columns.description: A reference number for the sales order associated with the transaction.

columns.name: reference_number
columns.description: A unique reference number for tracking the transaction.

columns.name: branch_no
columns.description: The identifier for the branch where the transaction took place.

columns.name: tran_date
columns.description: The date on which the transaction was initiated.

columns.name: tran_date_time
columns.description: The exact date and time when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: acct_no
columns.description: The account number associated with the transaction.

columns.name: client_name
columns.description: The name of the client or account holder involved in the transaction.

columns.name: so_tien
columns.description: The monetary amount involved in the transaction.

columns.name: noi_dung
columns.description: The content or details of the transaction.

columns.name: chu_thich
columns.description: Any additional notes or annotations related to the transaction.

columns.name: payment_service_type
columns.description: The type of payment service used for the transaction.
